text: Sunnegga is an Alpine area in the canton of Wallis. It is above sea level. It is a popular destination for skiing in the winter. == Transport == One can take a Metro through the Sunnegga Tunnel from Zermatt. Then from Findeln, you will have to take a cable car to arrive at Sunnegga. == Other websites == * https://www.zermatt.ch/Media/Attraktionen/Sunnegga * https://www.matterhornparadise.ch/de/buchen/tickets/sunnegga Category:Geography of Switzerland
title: Sunnegga
